screen_design_ref: Figure 18.1: Blue vs Red Team Analytics Dashboard
description: Verify that the Blue vs Red Team Analytics page loads correctly with admin authentication
scenario: Admin user navigates to the Blue vs Red Team analytics dashboard to view cybersecurity simulation performance metrics
expected_results: Display the complete Blue vs Red Team Analytics page with header, overview stats, performance metrics, asset protection breakdown, and attack pattern analysis sections
procedure:
1. Login as admin user with valid credentials
2. Navigate to /admin/player-analytics/blue-vs-red
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check that header shows 'Blue vs Red Team Analytics' title
5. Verify all main sections are visible and properly formatted

description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the Blue vs Red Team Analytics page
scenario: Regular user attempts to access the Blue vs Red Team analytics dashboard without admin privileges
expected_results: User should be redirected to login page or receive access denied message
procedure:
1. Login as regular user (non-admin)
2. Attempt to navigate to /admin/player-analytics/blue-vs-red
3. Verify access is denied
4. Check redirect behavior
5. Confirm proper error handling

description: Verify that the overview statistics section displays correct data format and values
scenario: Admin views the overview statistics cards showing total games, average duration, player win rate, and asset protection rate
expected_results: Display four statistics cards with proper icons, labels, and formatted values: Total Games (1247), Avg Game Duration (9.5m), Player Win Rate (68.3%), Asset Protection (74.8%)
procedure:
1. Access Blue vs Red Team Analytics page as admin
2. Locate the overview statistics section
3. Verify all four cards are displayed
4. Check data values match expected format
5. Verify icons and styling are correct

description: Verify that the Defense Performance section displays all cybersecurity defense metrics correctly
scenario: Admin reviews defense performance metrics including threat detection speed, incident response effectiveness, security control optimization, and alert prioritization accuracy
expected_results: Display Defense Performance card with all metrics: Threat Detection Speed (127.3s), Incident Response Effectiveness (81.2%), Security Control Optimization (76.4%), Alert Prioritization Accuracy (79.8%)
procedure:
1. Navigate to Defense Performance section
2. Verify section title displays 'Defense Performance' with shield emoji
3. Check all four defense metrics are visible
4. Verify progress bars display correct percentages
5. Confirm color coding (green, blue, purple) is applied correctly

description: Verify that the Attack Metrics section displays all AI attack performance data correctly
scenario: Admin analyzes attack metrics including AI attack success rate, player action efficiency, and response time metrics
expected_results: Display Attack Metrics card with all values: AI Attack Success Rate (34.7%), Player Action Efficiency (73.0%), MTTD (89.4s), MTTR (234.7s), RTO (312.6s)
procedure:
1. Locate the Attack Metrics section
2. Verify section title displays 'Attack Metrics' with sword emoji
3. Check all five attack metrics are visible
4. Verify color coding for different metrics
5. Confirm time values are displayed in seconds

description: Verify that the Asset Protection section displays circular progress indicators for all protected assets
scenario: Admin views asset protection rates for different cybersecurity simulation assets using SVG circular progress charts
expected_results: Display four circular progress indicators for: Academy Server (78.2%), Student Database (74.1%), Research Files (71.9%), Learning Platform (75.6%) with different colors
procedure:
1. Navigate to Asset Protection Rates section
2. Verify section title and shield emoji display
3. Check all four asset categories are shown
4. Verify circular SVG progress indicators render correctly
5. Confirm percentages match the center text values

description: Verify that the Attack Pattern Analysis table displays all attack phases with success and detection rates
scenario: Admin reviews the comprehensive attack pattern analysis table showing each attack phase performance
expected_results: Display table with 5 attack phases: Reconnaissance, Initial Access, Persistence, Privilege Escalation, Data Exfiltration with corresponding success rates and detection rates
procedure:
1. Scroll to Attack Pattern Analysis section
2. Verify table headers are correctly labeled
3. Check all 5 attack phases are listed
4. Verify progress bars show correct percentages
5. Confirm defense effectiveness badges display proper colors and text

description: Verify that the navigation buttons in the header function correctly
scenario: Admin uses the navigation buttons to move between different admin sections
expected_results: Admin Dashboard button navigates to admin dashboard, Back to Analytics button returns to player analytics main page
procedure:
1. Locate header navigation buttons
2. Click 'Admin Dashboard' button
3. Verify navigation to admin dashboard
4. Return to Blue vs Red analytics page
5. Click 'Back to Analytics' button and verify navigation

description: Verify that the Blue vs Red analytics page is accessible via the correct URL route

description: Verify that admin session management works correctly when accessing the analytics page

5. Confirm all interactive elements are accessible

description: Verify that the page handles various error states gracefully without breaking functionality

procedure:
1. Test with malformed data responses
